comment.author: 88405177@N00
comment._content: This looks like a western depiction of a temple... is it from a set of such?

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: The caption on the left says "Chinese Buddhist Temple Exhibit/ [inscrutable] California".  I'd guess it's related to the missionary exhibit in the previous photo.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Possibly part of an Anglican mission exhibit that took place at the Cathedral of St, John the Divine in Morningside Heights in October 1913. See NYT of Sept 21, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9C03E0D7113BE633A...

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content:
By George, I think you've got it.  With that clue I looked again, and the caption says "Chinese Buddhist Temple Exhibit / at Episcopal Conference"

I thought MY handwriting was bad.
